alert.note: Alert for Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 9:01AM AKST until December 10 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow occurring. Additional snow accumulation of 2 To 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...From Dillingham west. * WHEN...Until noon AKST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility to a half mile. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds near the coast will produce areas of blowing snow with visibilities down to a half mile from Dillingham and west towards Togiak. Stronger winds will decrease by this afternoon and end the threat for blowing snow. More significant snowfall is expected to spread across nearly all of Bristol Bay this evening through Sunday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
